rooms.description: An inviting entrance hall that leads to the open-plan living and kitchen area.
Contemporary open-plan space combining living room and kitchen, featuring modern finishes and integrated lighting.
A dining area seamlessly integrated with the living space, adhering to Vastu guidelines for seating arrangements.
A guest bathroom on the ground floor, ensuring privacy and convenience.
A master bedroom on the ground floor with an ensuite bathroom, designed for privacy and relaxation.

openings.description: A modern, secure main entrance door positioned in the east facing direction for positive energy.
Large windows in living and kitchen area to maximize natural light according to Vastu principles.
Interior door connecting the entrance hallway with the living and dining areas, ensuring smooth flow.

rooms.description: Well-lit bedroom on the first floor with access to a balcony, adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Cozy bedroom on the first floor designed for relaxation and privacy.
Additional bedroom ensuring ample space, placed in alignment with Vastu principles.
A bedroom on the first floor that maintains a serene atmosphere, adhering to Vastu norms.
The final bedroom on the first floor designed for a peaceful retreat.
A full bathroom on the first floor ensuring convenience for all residents, with Vastu considerations for placement.

openings.description: Balconies adjoining bedrooms, designed to enhance natural ventilation and lighting per Vastu.
Windows in all bedrooms to maximize daylight and positive energy according to Vastu guidelines.
